game.title: The Mysterious Legacy of King Midas
game.objective: Reveal the hidden treasure of the golden king and restore its rightful place in the kingdom.
game.description: A legendary quest, seeking the artifact that can unlock the true power of Midas' wealth. Elder Elara, the wise Oracle, has revealed the first task - journey to the heart of the Enchanted Forest.
game.reward: Unmatched riches and a place among the kingdom's greatest heroes
game.quest-giver: Elder Elara, Oracle of the Forest

task.objective: Journey to the Heart of the Enchanted Forest
task.description: Navigate the serpentine paths, confront guardian spirits and solve ancient riddles to enter the heart of the forest.
